name: Blue Witch
description:
Blue Witch is a game made with study in mind, as a project (the first one!) for the game course we are doing.
The game can be buggy and even very short, but it was made with a lot of effort and dedication. Except for the lever, the entire game was made with sprites and audios here from itch.io free to use.

In the game, you have to collect the 5 gems scattered across the map, and then face the ultimate challenge!

Controls:
Arrows Left and Right to move
Spacebar to jump
Z to attack
V to interact

(At the moment the game doesn't support smartphones, but in a few weeks that will change!)

Made by: @paulo_hmj and @genyarai_
